Instructions:
##
You are performing a code review. Review the attached diff and identify bugs or issues introduced by the changes.
Added lines are marked with "+" and removed lines with "-".
Suggest improvements strictly for the changed code only and ignore any commented-out code in the diff.
For golang code, watch for the potential performance issues or improvements
Show the exact file lines that need to be modified with corrected content.
Do not describe the purpose of the original file.
Do not suggest renaming variables.
Check if the title well represents the idea of code changes
Output must be in Markdown format and contain only a short bullet list of identified issues (if any) and corrected code snippets with explicit line references.
Be concise and technical.
Do not add commentary outside these rules.
##
